channel.title: BBC Lancashire on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in BBC Lancashire on News Lancashire

item.title: 'I won't take disgraced names off Comedy Carpet'
item.description: Gordon Young was speaking after calls to remove Rolf Harris’ name from the Blackpool attraction. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Homelessness in Blackpool double England average
item.description: The end of a private rented sector tenancy is the main cause of homelessness in the resort. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Plea for Preston bus lane fines to stay in city
item.description: Lancashire County Council says it invests proceeds from fines in maintaining and upgrading highways. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: 'Extreme weather' thwarts search for missing girl
item.description: Inaayah, 7, from Blackburn was hit by a large wave as she sat on rocks on a beach in Casablanca. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Preston North End and Hull City fined for fracas
item.description: Preston North End and Hull City are fined by the FA for improper conduct after a melee in the aftermath of Milutin Osmajic’s sending off last month. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Ex-police officer jailed for coercing woman
item.description: Michael Harvey had already admitted “using police systems” to look up the complainant. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Ex-England bowler Kabir Ali new Lancs bowling coach
item.description: Kabir Ali, who played one Test and 14 ODIs for England, is named as Lancashire’s new lead bowling coach. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Rogue roofer jailed for scamming pensioners
item.description: Robert Macintyre charged one 78-year-old victim £11,500 for worthless roofing work. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Homes demolition behind football ground approved
item.description: The long row of terraced homes back on to the Bloomfield Road football stadium. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Best pals 'living dream' in boyband December 10
item.description: Danny Bretherton and Josh Olliver, 17, were handpicked by Simon Cowell to join the new boyband. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: 'Northerners feel outnumbered at my northern uni'
item.description: Lucy Morville, from Burnley revives York University’s Northern Society to give northerners a home. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: "I think they would have been better sticking with Ismael'
item.description: The BBC’s 72+ EFL podcast team analyse Blackburn’s decision to sack experienced manager Valerien Ismael in the middle of a relegation fight. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Calls to consult over plans to close hospital beds
item.description: Councillors warn the proposed closure of 24 beds would be a “significant change” for patients. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Theatre school teacher sent explicit texts to child
item.description: Chris Higgins offending came to light when the 14-year-old victim’s father found messages he had sent. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: 'Blow to lose Armstrong, but good signings made'
item.description: BBC Radio Lancashire’s Andy Bayes analyses Preston North End’s January transfer business. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Blackburn must get next appointment 'spot on'
item.description: BBC Radio Lancashire’s Andy Bayes says Blackburn Rovers could face dire consequences if they fail to get their managerial appointment right. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Ben Wallace in trademark row with whisky brand
item.description: Glenfiddich issues a legal claim ex-defence minister Ben Wallace over the name of his new firm. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Cathedral hosts knitted World War Two exhibition
item.description: Blackburn Cathedral is hosting The Longest Yarn exhibition, with 80m of knitted panels on display. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Murder arrest after woman with head injury dies
item.description: A woman in her 70s was found unresponsive and taken to hospital where she died two days later. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Four held in £3m illegal TV streaming raids
item.description: The raids, across Greater Manchester and Lancashire, uncovered 10 servers and equipment worth £750,000. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Council facing £16m shortfalls vows to make no cuts
item.description: Blackpool Council says despite having to make up the surplus it will strive to protect public services. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: 'Bigger doesn't mean better' for police reforms
item.description: Lancashire’s former police and crime commissioner has doubts about the impact of merging police forces. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: 'Fun' at the core of exercise classes for elderly
item.description: Westmorland Homecare are running a six-week trial to help elderly people develop mobility. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Frustrated dad violently shook baby son, jury told
item.description: Peter Sayle, 31, denies murdering his six-week-old son Huxley in Preston in June 2022. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: Teen avoids jail after causing her baby's death
item.description: A postmortem examination showed the baby boy - named Cameron - died from suffocation. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: BAE staff begin new three-week strike action
item.description: The Unite union accuses BAE of altering offers ‘at the last minute’ as staff return to strike action. Source: BBC Lancashire
